attributes.action: Ban under-14s from pub-style restaurants such as Harvester and JD Wetherspoon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, all under 18s are allowed in pub-style restaurants if they are accompanied by their parents. Parents who take their children to such restaurants can easy become stressed if their children 'play up,' thus making the environment more stressful for other customers. Some parents may even hit their children if it all becomes too much, which can also make the atmosphere more unpleasant.

If all under 14s could be banned from all Harvester, JD Wetherspoon, Brewer's Fayre, Toby Carvery and Beefeater chain restaurants, then it would give parents and other customers a more relaxed experience. 

Customers between the ages of 14 and 17 should be accompanied by an adult when attending those restaurants.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
